mapper.sql: tpm.id, tpm.user_id, TO_CHAR(tpm.propose_date,'YYYY-MM-DD') propose_date, tpm.duty_level, tpm.major, tpm.duty_time_limit, tpm.position,TO_CHAR(tpm.position_get_time,'YYYY-MM-DD') position_get_time, tpm.position_level, tpm.propose_position, tpm.propose_state, tpm.objective_point, tpm.total_point, tpm.area_number, tpm.BACKUP1, tpm.BACKUP2, tpm.BACKUP3, tpm.userpicurl, tpm.usertype, tpm.frontidcardpicurl, tpm.behindidcardpicurl, tpm.extrainfo, tpm.createtime, tpm.statu, tpm.fristeducation, tpm.fristeducationurl, TO_CHAR(tpm.fristeducationtime,'YYYY-MM-DD') fristeducationtime, tpm.maxeducation,TO_CHAR(tpm.maxeducationtime,'YYYY-MM-DD') maxeducationtime, tpm.maxeducationurl, tpm.profess, tpm.profess_certificate,TO_CHAR(tpm.startworktime,'YYYY-MM-DD') startworktime, tpm.nowjob,TO_CHAR(tpm.nowjob_time,'YYYY-MM-DD') nowjob_time, tpm.foreign_name, tpm.foreign_level,TO_CHAR(tpm.foreign_time,'YYYY-MM-DD') foreign_time, sd1.dict_name current_post, sd.dict_name current_post_series, current_post_level, TO_CHAR(tpm.current_post_get_time,'YYYY-MM-DD') current_post_get_time, TO_CHAR(tpm.current_post_engage_time,'YYYY-MM-DD') current_post_engage_time, sd3.dict_name other_post,sd2.dict_name other_post_series, tpm.other_post_level, TO_CHAR(tpm.other_post_engage_time,'YYYY-MM-DD') other_post_engage_time, tpm.administrative_post, TO_CHAR(tpm.administrative_post_time,'YYYY-MM-DD') administrative_post_time, tpm.social_post, tpm.social_post_phone, tpm.years_one, tpm.years_one_info, tpm.years_two, tpm.years_two_info, tpm.years_three, tpm.years_three_info, tpm.years_four, tpm.years_four_info, tpm.years_five, tpm.years_five_info, tpm.pdfurl, tpm.progress, tpm.stat, tpm.shenbaomajor_id, tpm.stat2, tpm.pingshentype, tpm.JUDGING_STAGE, tpm.BASE_JUDGING_SERIES, tpm.REVIEW_SERIES, tpm.SEX, tpm.NATION, tpm.POLITICAL_OUTLOOK, tpm.EDU_EDU, tpm.EDU_DEGREE, tpm.EDU_MAJOR, tpm.REPORT_DATE, tpm.CURRENT_STATE

prop.id,prop.user_id "prop.user_id",prop.propose_date ,prop.duty_level ,prop.major ,prop. duty_time_limit,prop.position,prop.position_get_time, prop.position_level,prop.propose_position,prop.propose_state,prop.objective_point,prop.total_point, prop.area_number,prop.BACKUP1, prop.BACKUP2,prop.BACKUP3,prop.userpicurl,prop.usertype,prop.frontidcardpicurl,prop.behindidcardpicurl,prop.extrainfo, prop.createtime,prop.statu, prop.fristeducation,prop.fristeducationurl,prop.fristeducationtime,prop.maxeducation,prop.maxeducationtime, prop.maxeducationurl,prop.profess,prop.profess_certificate,prop.startworktime,prop.nowjob,prop.nowjob_time, prop.foreign_name,prop.foreign_level,prop.foreign_time,prop.current_post,prop.current_post_series,prop.current_post_level, prop.current_post_get_time,prop.current_post_engage_time,prop.other_post,prop.other_post_series,prop.other_post_level, prop.other_post_engage_time,prop.administrative_post,prop.administrative_post_time,prop.social_post, prop.social_post_phone,prop.years_one,prop.years_one_info,prop.years_two,prop.years_two_info,prop.years_three, prop.years_three_info,prop.years_four,prop.years_four_info,prop.years_five,prop.years_five_info,prop.pdfurl, prop.progress,prop.stat,prop.shenbaomajor_id,prop.stat2,prop.pingshentype, prop.JUDGING_STAGE, prop.BASE_JUDGING_SERIES, prop.REVIEW_SERIES, prop.SEX, prop.NATION, prop.POLITICAL_OUTLOOK, prop.EDU_EDU, prop.EDU_DEGREE, prop.EDU_MAJOR,prop.REPORT_DATE,prop.CURRENT_STATE, sysd.dict_name majorName,sysd1.dict_name positionName , sysd11.dict_name years_one_info_name,sysd12.dict_name years_two_info_name, sysd13.dict_name years_three_info_name,sysd14.dict_name years_four_info_name, sysd15.dict_name years_five_info_name,
BASE.ID "BASE.ID", BASE.DECLARE_UNITCODE "BASE.DECLARE_UNITCODE", BASE.BASIC_UNITCODE "BASE.BASIC_UNITCODE",BASE.DISPLAY_NAME "BASE.DISPLAY_NAME", BASE.MOBILEPHONE "BASE.MOBILEPHONE",BASE.EMAIL "BASE.EMAIL", BASE.ID_CARD_NO "BASE.ID_CARD_NO", BASE.ADD_USER_ID "BASE.ADD_USER_ID", BASE.ADD_TIME "BASE.ADD_TIME", BASE.STATE "BASE.STATE", BASE.BACKUP1 "BASE.BACKUP1", BASE.BACKUP2 "BASE.BACKUP2", BASE.BACKUP3 "BASE.BACKUP3",
summ.ID "summ.ID",summ.USER_ID "summ.USER_ID",summ.SUMMARY "summ.SUMMARY",
edu.id "edu.id",edu.user_id "edu.user_id", TO_CHAR(edu.starttime,'YYYY-MM-DD') "edu.starttime", TO_CHAR(edu.endtime,'YYYY-MM-DD') "edu.endtime", edu.schoolname "edu.schoolname", edu.job "edu.job", edu.reference "edu.reference", edu.fulltimetype "edu.fulltimetype", edu.extrainfo "edu.extrainfo",edu.state "edu.state",edu.major "edu.major",edu.education "edu.education", edu.degree "edu.degree",edu.backup1 "edu.backup1",edu.backup2 "edu.backup2",edu.backup3 "edu.backup3", edu.EDUFID "eduf.id",edu.edid "eduf.edid",edu.fileurl "eduf.fileurl",edu.filetype "eduf.filetype",edu.dict_name "edu.dict_name",edu.dict_name1 "edu.dict_name1",
wor.id "wor.id",wor.user_id "wor.user_id", TO_CHAR(wor.starttime ,'YYYY-MM-DD') "wor.starttime", TO_CHAR(wor.endtime,'YYYY-MM-DD') "wor.endtime", wor.workcompanyname "wor.workcompanyname",wor.job "wor.job",wor.positionaltitles "wor.positionaltitles", wor.reference "wor.reference",wor.extrainfo "wor.extrainfo", wor.state "wor.state", wor.backup1 "wor.backup1",wor.backup2 "wor.backup2",wor.backup3 "wor.backup3", wor.WORFID "worf.id",wor.workid "worf.workid",wor.fileurl "worf.fileurl",
tra.ID "tra.ID",tra.USER_ID "tra.USER_ID",TO_CHAR(tra.STARTTIME,'YYYY-MM-DD') "tra.STARTTIME", TO_CHAR(tra.ENDTIME,'YYYY-MM-DD') "tra.ENDTIME",tra.PLACE "tra.PLACE", tra.REFERENCE "tra.REFERENCE",tra.CONTENT "tra.CONTENT",tra.BACKUP1 "tra.BACKUP1",tra.BACKUP2 "tra.BACKUP2",tra.BACKUP3 "tra.BACKUP3", tra.TRAFID "traf.id",tra.TRAINID "traf.trainid",tra.FILEURL "traf.fileurl",
awa.ID "awa.ID",awa.USER_ID "awa.USER_ID", awa.NAME "awa.NAME", awa.AWARD_DEPARTMENT "awa.AWARD_DEPARTMENT",TO_CHAR(awa.AWARD_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') "awa.AWARD_DATE", awa.PAIMING "awa.PAIMING", awa.AWARD_LEVEL "awa.AWARD_LEVEL", awa.GRADE "awa.GRADE", awa.BACKUP1 "awa.BACKUP1", awa.BACKUP2 "awa.BACKUP2",awa.BACKUP3 "awa.BACKUP3", awa.AWAFID "awaf.id",awa.award_id "awaf.awardId",awa.fileurl "awaf.fileurl",
pat.id "pat.id", pat.user_id "pat.user_id", pat.patentname "pat.patentname", pat.patenttype "pat.patenttype", pat.paiming "pat.paiming", pat.ascriptiontype "pat.ascriptiontype",TO_CHAR(pat.patentcompletetime,'YYYY-MM-DD') "pat.patentcompletetime", pat.patentnumber "pat.patentnumber", pat.state "pat.state", pat.PATFID "patf.id",pat.patentid "patf.patentid",pat.fileurl "patf.fileurl",
pro.id "pro.id", pro.user_id "pro.user_id", pro.projectname "pro.projectname", pro.projectcompany "pro.projectcompany", TO_CHAR(pro.projectstarttime,'YYYY-MM-DD') "pro.projectstarttime", pro.projectrole "pro.projectrole", pro.projectmoney "pro.projectmoney", TO_CHAR(pro.projectacceptancetime,'YYYY-MM-DD') "pro.projectacceptancetime", pro.acceptancetype "pro.acceptancetype", pro.conclusiontype "pro.conclusiontype", pro.paiming "pro.paiming", pro.headman "pro.headman", pro.state "pro.state", pro.PFID "prof.id",pro.projectid "prof.projectid",pro.fileurl "prof.fileurl",
pap.ID "pap.ID", pap.USER_ID "pap.USER_ID", pap.PAPERNAME "pap.PAPERNAME", TO_CHAR(pap.PUBLISHTIME,'YYYY-MM-DD') "pap.PUBLISHTIME", pap.WORDNUMBER "pap.WORDNUMBER", pap.PUBLISHINGHOUSE "pap.PUBLISHINGHOUSE", pap.APPRAISAL "pap.APPRAISAL", pap.PAIMING "pap.PAIMING", pap.EXTRAINFO "pap.EXTRAINFO", pap.STATE "pap.STATE", pap.PUBLICATION_NAME "pap.PUBLICATION_NAME", pap.ISBN "pap.ISBN", pap.PAPER_LEVEL "pap.PAPER_LEVEL",pap.PAPFID "papf.id",pap.paperid "papf.paperid", pap.fileurl "papf.fileurl",
book.ID "book.ID", book.USER_ID "book.USER_ID", book.BOOKNAME "book.BOOKNAME", TO_CHAR(book.PUBLISHTIME,'YYYY-MM-DD') "book.PUBLISHTIME", book.WORDNUMBER "book.WORDNUMBER", book.PUBLISHINGHOUSE "book.PUBLISHINGHOUSE", book.PAIMING "book.PAIMING", book.EXTRAINFO "book.EXTRAINFO", book.BOOK_LEVEL "book.BOOK_LEVEL", book.BOOK_NUMBER "book.BOOK_NUMBER", book.BOOKFID "bookf.id",book.book_id "bookf.book_id",book.fileurl "bookf.fileurl",
res.ID "res.ID",res.USER_ID "res.USER_ID",TO_CHAR(res.GET_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') "res.GET_DATE", res.RESEARCH_NAME "res.RESEARCH_NAME",res.RESEARCH_INFO "res.RESEARCH_INFO", res.RESEARCH_LEVEL "res.RESEARCH_LEVEL",res.RESEARCH_LEVEL_NAME "res.RESEARCH_LEVEL_NAME",res.BACKUP1 "res.BACKUP1", res.BACKUP2 "res.BACKUP2",res.BACKUP3 "res.BACKUP3", res.PAIMING "res.PAIMING",res.RESFID "resf.id",res.researchid "resf.researchid", res.fileurl "resf.fileurl"

select
from tb_proposer_msg tpm LEFT JOIN sys_dict sd on sd.DICT_CODE=tpm.CURRENT_POST_SERIES and sd.GROUP_NAME='REVIEW_SERIES'
left join sys_dict sd1 on sd1.dict_code=tpm.CURRENT_POST and sd1.group_name='POSITIONAL_TITLES'
LEFT JOIN sys_dict sd2 on sd2.DICT_CODE=tpm.OTHER_POST_SERIES and sd2.GROUP_NAME='REVIEW_SERIES'
left join sys_dict sd3 on sd3.dict_code=tpm.OTHER_POST and sd3.group_name='POSITIONAL_TITLES'
select ID, DECLARE_UNITCODE, BASIC_UNITCODE, DISPLAY_NAME, MOBILEPHONE, EMAIL, ID_CARD_NO, ADD_USER_ID, ADD_TIME, STATE, BACKUP1, BACKUP2, BACKUP3 from BASE_PROPOSER WHERE STATE='1'
select ID, USER_ID, SUMMARY from tb_summary

e.id,e.user_id, e.starttime, e.endtime, e.schoolname, e.job, e.reference, e.fulltimetype, e.extrainfo, e.state,e.major,e.education,e.degree,e.backup1,e.backup2,e.backup3,ef.id "EDUFID",ef.edid,ef.fileurl,ef.filetype,sd.dict_name,sd1.dict_name dict_name1
id, user_id, starttime, endtime, schoolname, job, reference, fulltimetype, extrainfo, state,major,education,degree,backup1,backup2,backup3

select from ( select from tb_education where user_id=#{userid} and state='1' ) e left join (select id, edid,fileurl,FILETYPE from tb_education_file) ef on e.id=ef.edid LEFT JOIN SYS_DICT sd ON sd.GROUP_NAME = 'DEGREE' AND sd.DICT_CODE = e. DEGREE LEFT JOIN SYS_DICT sd1 ON sd1.GROUP_NAME = 'EDU_EDU' AND sd1.DICT_CODE = e.EDUCATION
w.id,w.user_id, w.starttime, w.endtime, w.workcompanyname, w.job, w.positionaltitles, w.reference, w.extrainfo, w.state,w.backup1,w.backup2,w.backup3,wf.id "WORFID",wf.workid,wf.fileurl
id, user_id, starttime, endtime, workcompanyname, job, positionaltitles, reference, extrainfo, state,backup1,backup2,backup3
select from ( select from tb_work where user_id=#{userid} and state='1' ) w left join (select id, workid,fileurl from tb_work_file) wf on w.id=wf.workid
t.ID,t.USER_ID,t.STARTTIME,t.ENDTIME,t.PLACE,t.REFERENCE,t.CONTENT,t.BACKUP1,t.BACKUP2,t.BACKUP3, tf.id "TRAFID",tf.trainid,tf.fileurl
ID, USER_ID, STARTTIME, ENDTIME, PLACE, REFERENCE, CONTENT, BACKUP1, BACKUP2, BACKUP3
select from ( select from TB_TRAIN where user_id=#{userid} ) T left join (select id, trainid,fileurl from TB_TRAIN_FILE) TF on T.id=TF.TRAINID
a.ID,a.USER_ID, a.NAME, a.AWARD_DEPARTMENT,a.AWARD_DATE, a.PAIMING, a.AWARD_LEVEL, a.GRADE, a.BACKUP1, a.BACKUP2, a.BACKUP3,af.id "AWAFID",af.award_id,af.fileurl
ID,USER_ID, NAME, AWARD_DEPARTMENT, AWARD_DATE, PAIMING, AWARD_LEVEL, GRADE, BACKUP1, BACKUP2, BACKUP3
select from ( select from tb_award where user_id=#{userid} ) a left join (select id, award_id,fileurl from tb_award_file) af on a.id=af.award_id
p.id, p.user_id, p.patentname, p.patenttype, p.paiming, p.ascriptiontype, p.patentcompletetime, p.patentnumber, p.state,pf.id "PATFID",pf.patentid,pf.fileurl
id, user_id, patentname, patenttype, paiming, ascriptiontype, patentcompletetime, patentnumber, state
select from ( select from tb_patent where user_id=#{userid} and state='1' ) p left join (select id, patentid,fileurl from tb_patent_file) pf on p.id=pf.patentid

p.id, p.user_id, p.projectname, p.projectcompany, p.projectstarttime, p.projectrole, p.projectmoney, p.projectacceptancetime, p.acceptancetype, p.conclusiontype, p.paiming, p.headman, p.state,pf.id "PFID",pf.projectid,pf.fileurl
id, user_id, projectname, projectcompany, projectstarttime, projectrole, projectmoney, projectacceptancetime, acceptancetype, conclusiontype, paiming, headman, state
select from ( select from tb_project where user_id=#{userid} and state='1' ) p left join (select id, projectid,fileurl from tb_project_file) pf on p.id=pf.projectid

p.ID, p.USER_ID, p.PAPERNAME, p.PUBLISHTIME, p.WORDNUMBER, p.PUBLISHINGHOUSE, p.APPRAISAL, p.PAIMING, EXTRAINFO, p.STATE, p.PUBLICATION_NAME, p.ISBN, p.PAPER_LEVEL,pf.id "PAPFID",pf.paperid,pf.fileurl
ID, USER_ID, PAPERNAME, PUBLISHTIME, WORDNUMBER, PUBLISHINGHOUSE, APPRAISAL, PAIMING, EXTRAINFO, STATE, PUBLICATION_NAME, ISBN, PAPER_LEVEL
select from ( select from tb_paper where user_id=#{userid} and state='1' ) p left join (select id, paperid,fileurl from tb_paper_file) pf on p.id=pf.paperid
b.ID, b.USER_ID, b.BOOKNAME, b.PUBLISHTIME, b.WORDNUMBER, b.PUBLISHINGHOUSE, b.PAIMING, b.EXTRAINFO, b.BOOK_LEVEL, b.BOOK_NUMBER,bf.id "BOOKFID",bf.book_id,bf.fileurl
ID, USER_ID, BOOKNAME, PUBLISHTIME, WORDNUMBER, PUBLISHINGHOUSE, PAIMING, EXTRAINFO, BOOK_LEVEL, BOOK_NUMBER
select from ( select from tb_book where user_id=#{userid} ) b left join (select id, book_id,fileurl from tb_book_file) bf on b.id=bf.book_id
R.ID,R.USER_ID,R.GET_DATE,R.RESEARCH_NAME,R.RESEARCH_INFO,R.RESEARCH_LEVEL,R.BACKUP1,R.BACKUP2,R.BACKUP3, R.PAIMING,rf.id "RESFID",rf.researchid,rf.fileurl,rd.DICT_NAME "RESEARCH_LEVEL_NAME"
ID, USER_ID, GET_DATE, RESEARCH_NAME, RESEARCH_INFO, RESEARCH_LEVEL, BACKUP1, BACKUP2, BACKUP3,PAIMING

select from ( select from tb_research where user_id=#{userid} ) r left join (select id, researchid,fileurl from tb_research_file) rf on r.id=rf.researchid left join (select DICT_NAME,DICT_CODE from SYS_DICT where GROUP_NAME='GRADE_OF_RESEARCH_RESULTS')rd on r.RESEARCH_LEVEL=rd.DICT_CODE
mapper.select:
select
from () prop LEFT JOIN () BASE on prop.user_id=BASE.id LEFT JOIN () summ on prop.user_id=summ.user_id LEFT join () edu on prop.user_id=edu.user_id left join () wor on prop.user_id=wor.user_id left join () tra on prop.user_id=tra.user_id left join () awa on prop.user_id=awa.user_id left join () pat on prop.user_id=pat.user_id left join () pro on prop.user_id=pro.user_id left join () book on prop.user_id=book.user_id left join () pap on prop.user_id=pap.user_id left join () res on prop.user_id=res.user_id left join sys_dict sysd on sysd.dict_code=prop.major and sysd.group_name='INDUSTRY_INVOLVED' left join sys_dict sysd1 on sysd1.dict_code=prop.position and sysd1.group_name='POSITIONAL_TITLES' left join sys_dict sysd11 on sysd11.dict_code=prop.years_one_info and sysd11.group_name='YEAR_ASSESSMENT' left join sys_dict sysd12 on sysd12.dict_code=prop.years_two_info and sysd12.group_name='YEAR_ASSESSMENT' left join sys_dict sysd13 on sysd13.dict_code=prop.years_three_info and sysd13.group_name='YEAR_ASSESSMENT' left join sys_dict sysd14 on sysd14.dict_code=prop.years_four_info and sysd14.group_name='YEAR_ASSESSMENT' left join sys_dict sysd15 on sysd15.dict_code=prop.years_five_info and sysd15.group_name='YEAR_ASSESSMENT' WHERE prop.user_id=#{userid}
mapper.update:
update tb_proposer_msg
JUDGING_STAGE = #{judgingStage,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CURRENT_STATE = #{currentState,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PROPOSE_STATE = #{proposeState,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BASE_JUDGING_SERIES = #{baseJudgingSeries,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where user_id = #{userid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
SELECT g.id, g.display_name, g.id_card_no, g.unit_name, g.XILIE, g.ZIGE, g.professial_name, g.LEIXING, g.judging_name, g.state, g.BASE_JUDGING_SERIES
FROM ( SELECT * FROM ( SELECT * FROM base_proposer WHERE id = #{userid} and STATE='1') a LEFT JOIN ( SELECT unit_code, UNIT_NAME FROM base_unit ) b ON a.declare_unitcode = b.unit_code LEFT JOIN ( SELECT pm1.user_id, pm1.BASE_JUDGING_SERIES, sd1.dict_name "XILIE", sd2.dict_name "ZIGE", sd3.dict_name "LEIXING", bj1.judging_name, bp1.professial_name FROM ( SELECT USER_ID, REVIEW_SERIES, propose_position, SHENBAOMAJOR_ID, pingshentype, BASE_JUDGING_SERIES FROM TB_PROPOSER_MSG WHERE user_id = #{userid} ) pm1 LEFT JOIN ( SELECT dict_code, dict_name FROM sys_dict WHERE group_name = 'REVIEW_SERIES' ) sd1 ON sd1.dict_code = pm1.REVIEW_SERIES LEFT JOIN ( SELECT dict_code, dict_name FROM sys_dict WHERE group_name = 'POSITIONAL_TITLES' ) sd2 ON sd2.dict_code = pm1.propose_position LEFT JOIN ( SELECT dict_code, dict_name FROM sys_dict WHERE group_name = 'REVIEW_TYPE' ) sd3 ON sd3.dict_code = pm1.pingshentype LEFT JOIN ( SELECT judging_code, judging_name FROM BASE_JUDGING ) bj1 ON bj1.judging_code = pm1.BASE_JUDGING_SERIES LEFT JOIN ( SELECT professial_code, professial_name FROM BASE_SERIES_PROFESSIAL ) bp1 ON bp1.professial_code = pm1.SHENBAOMAJOR_ID ) pm ON a.id = pm.user_id ) g
